newsitem.title: UK: European base metals physical trades - March 3.
newsitem.headline: European base metals physical trades - March 3.

text.p: All prices in $/tonne (premium to LME unless stated).
MARCH 3 - Western aluminium ingots, cif Rotterdam, $48, $50. Russian A7E aluminium ingots, cif Rotterdam $38.

FEB 27 - Chinese tin, cif Rotterdam $20, $30. Malaysian tin, cif Rotterdam, $15. Indium, cif Rotterdam, $245, $255, $265 outright price). Antimony, cif Rotterdam, $2,385 (outright).Russian cobalt, cif Rotterdam, $17.85/lb outright). FEB 26 - Russian A7E aluminium ingots, cif Rotterdam, $40. Russian A6 aluminium ingot, cif Rotterdam, $25.
